name: Rhapzodé Resource Template
summary: An RRT file is a resource template used by altaVENTE Rhapzodé, a discontinued, third-party software program designed for authoring and exporting custom PowerPoint presentations. It contains information defining the structure and layout of a presentation that Rhapzodé references as a blueprint for generating PowerPoint Slide Show ( .PPS ) files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
